learnings.name: Jumpstart
learnings.description: Jumpstart is a learning program that helps you to get started with your career at Grant Thornton. It is a combination of online and classroom learning that will help you to understand the Grant Thornton culture, values, and the way we work. It will also help you to understand the various tools and technologies that you will be using in your day to day work. Jumpstart is a learning program that helps you to get started with your career at Grant Thornton.
